sentence: Heres a rundown, per Politico: In Pennsylvania, state Sen. Doug Mastriano launched his gubernatorial campaign by touting his support from two Trump associates former campaign lawyer Jenna Ellis and former national security adviser Michael Flynn who are loud proponents of conspiracy theories and lies about the 2020 election.
title: Opinion: Will 2022 be all about Trump? Direct that question at Republicans, not Democrats.

sentence: Open Queue This weeks conventional wisdom holds that state Sen. Doug Mastriano won the Pennsylvania Republican gubernatorial primary by inciting voters with claims of a stolen 2020 election.
author: Kimberley A. Strassel
title: The Limits of Stop the Steal
